trans-unit.source: Represents a row header of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控件中的行标头。

trans-unit.source: The row status images (pencil, asterisk, and arrow) are resized according to the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry:
trans-unit.target: 行状态映像 （铅笔、 星号，和箭头） 根据系统 DPI 设置调整大小，当 app.config 文件包含以下条目：

trans-unit.source: When you derive from <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell" /> and add new properties to the derived class, be sure to override the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell.Clone" /> method to copy the new properties during cloning operations.
trans-unit.target: 派生自<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell" />并将新属性添加到派生的类，请确保重写<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell.Clone" />方法以在克隆操作过程中复制新属性。

trans-unit.source: You should also call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell.Clone" /> method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell.
trans-unit.target: 你还应调用基类的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell.Clone" />方法，以便基类的属性复制到新的单元格。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this cell.
trans-unit.target: 创建此单元格的精确副本。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the cloned <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Object" />，表示克隆的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessible object for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell" />.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell" /> 创建一个新的可访问对象。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell.DataGridViewRowHeaderCellAccessibleObject" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell.DataGridViewRowHeaderCellAccessibleObject" /> 的新 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell" />。

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method, it will be called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A> property is referenced.
trans-unit.target: 如果不显式调用 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> 方法，则在引用 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A> 属性时将会调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: To get or set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 要获取或设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>，你必须添加对引用`Accessibility`随.NET Framework 一起安装的程序集。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: 包含该单元格的行从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the cell is in the first column of the region defined by the selected cells; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若单元格位于由选定单元格定义的区域的第一列，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the cell is the last column of the region defined by the selected cells; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若单元格位于由选定单元格定义的区域的最后一列，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the cell is in the first row of the region defined by the selected cells; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若单元格位于由选定单元格定义的区域的第一行，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the cell is in the last row of the region defined by the selected cells; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果该单元格位于选定单元格所定义区域内的最后一行中，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The current format string of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 单元格的当前格式字符串。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the formatted value of the cell to copy to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard" />.
trans-unit.target: 检索要复制到 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard" /> 的单元格的已设置格式的值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the value of the cell to copy to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，它表示要复制到 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard" /> 的单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ClipboardCopyMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, this method is called by the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A> method to retrieve a clipboard-formatted value that represents the cell.
trans-unit.target: 根据值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ClipboardCopyMode%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>由该控件的控件，调用此方法是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A>方法来检索表示单元格的剪贴板格式的值。

trans-unit.source: The position-related parameters of this method indicate where this cell is located in the table of data representing the region defined by the selected cells in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的位置相关参数指示此单元格表示定义中的所选单元格的区域的数据的表中的位置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the cell's position, formatting information may be returned by this method in addition to the cell value.
trans-unit.target: 根据单元格的位置，格式设置信息可能返回此方法，除了单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: For example, the HTML format for a cell in the first column of a row will include the tag that indicates the beginning of a row.
trans-unit.target: 例如，某一行的第一列中的单元格的 HTML 格式将包括标记，该值指示行的开头。

trans-unit.source: The supported clipboard formats include <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 支持的剪贴板格式包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html?displayProperty=nameWithType>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> 类。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rowIndex" /> is less than zero or greater than or equal to the number of rows in the control.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rowIndex" /> 小于零或大于等于控件中的行数。

trans-unit.source: The graphics context for the cell.
trans-unit.target: 单元格的图形上下文。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" /> to be applied to the cell.
trans-unit.target: 要对单元格应用的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" />。

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: 该单元格的父行索引。

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounding rectangle that encloses the cell's content area, which is calculated using the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> and cell style.
trans-unit.target: 返回围绕单元格内容区域的边框，该区域是使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 和单元格样式计算的。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that bounds the cell's contents.
trans-unit.target: 限定单元格内容区域的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />。

trans-unit.source: The graphics context for the cell.
trans-unit.target: 单元格的图形上下文。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" /> to be applied to the cell.
trans-unit.target: 要对单元格应用的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" />。

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: 该单元格的父行索引。

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounding rectangle that encloses the cell's error icon, if one is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果显示了单元格的错误图标，则返回环绕该图标的边框。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that bounds the cell's error icon, if one is displayed; otherwise, <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果显示了单元格的错误图标，则为包围该图标的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />；否则为 <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: The row index of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 单元格的行索引。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the error for the cell.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示单元格错误的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A string that describes the error for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />.
trans-unit.target: 描述当前 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> 的错误的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row to get the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip" /> of.
trans-unit.target: 要获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip" /> 的行的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index must be -1 to indicate the row of column headers.
trans-unit.target: 索引必须为 -1，以指示列标头所在的行。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the inherited shortcut menu for the specified row.
trans-unit.target: 检索指定行的继承快捷菜单。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip" /> of the row if one exists; otherwise, the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip" /> inherited from <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在行的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip" />，则为行的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip" />；否则为从 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 继承的。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.DataGridView" /> property of the cell is not <see langword="null" /> and the specified <paramref name="rowIndex" /> is less than 0 or greater than the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: 该单元格的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.DataGridView" /> 属性的值不为 <see langword="null" />，并且指定的 <paramref name="rowIndex" /> 小于 0 或大于控件中的行数减 1。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" /> to be populated with the inherited cell style.
trans-unit.target: 将使用继承的单元格样式填充的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" />。

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: 该单元格的父行索引。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to include inherited colors in the returned cell style; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在返回的单元格样式中包括继承的颜色，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the style applied to the cell.
trans-unit.target: 获取应用于单元格的样式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" /> that includes the style settings of the cell inherited from the cell's parent row, column, and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" />，它包括从单元格的父行、父列和父 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 继承而来的单元格样式设置。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to draw the cell.
trans-unit.target: 用于绘制单元格的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" /> that represents the style of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 表示单元格样式的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" />。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based row index of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 单元格的从零开始的行索引。

trans-unit.source: The cell's maximum allowable size.
trans-unit.target: 单元格允许的最大大小。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the preferred size, in pixels, of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 计算单元格的首选大小（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that represents the preferred size, in pixels, of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 表示单元格的首选大小的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: 该单元格的父行索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 获取单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: The value contained in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell" /> 中包含的值。

trans-unit.source: A `rowIndex` value of -1 indicates a shared row.
trans-unit.target: A`rowIndex`值-1 指示一个共享的行。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.DataGridView" /> property of the cell is not <see langword="null" /> and <paramref name="rowIndex" /> is less than -1 or greater than or equal to the number of rows in the parent <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 单元格的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.DataGridView" /> 属性值不是 <see langword="null" />，而且指定的 <paramref name="rowIndex" /> 小于 -1 或者大于或等于父 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 中的行数。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to paint the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />.
trans-unit.target: 用于绘制 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the area of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> that needs to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />，它表示需要重新绘制的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 区域。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that contains the bounds of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: 包含要绘制的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 的边界的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />。

trans-unit.source: The row index of the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: 当前所绘制的单元格的行索引。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> values that specifies the state of the cell.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> 值的按位组合，用于指定单元格的状态。

trans-unit.source: The data of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: 当前所绘制的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> 的数据。

trans-unit.source: The formatted data of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: 当前所绘制的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> 的格式化数据。

trans-unit.source: An error message that is associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: 与单元格关联的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" /> that contains formatting and style information about the cell.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" />，它包含有关单元格的格式设置和样式的信息。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> that contains border styles for the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" />，它包含当前所绘制的单元格的边框样式。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts" /> values that specifies which parts of the cell need to be painted.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts" /> 值的按位组合，用于指定需要绘制的单元格部分。

trans-unit.source: Paints the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell" />.
trans-unit.target: 绘制当前的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell" />。

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: 该单元格的父行索引。

trans-unit.source: The cell value to set.
trans-unit.target: 要设置的单元格值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 设置单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the value has been set; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已设置该值，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the string representation of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 返回单元格的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the current cell.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示当前单元格的字符串。
